topic.title: Unlocking stolen phones
topic.body: How much are you charging for unlocking stolen phone? Or how much you think is reasonable price is? Haters and good boys just walk around this, no need heros here. Cheers,

1567541468_1FgxurbLKzsfP2arYX7xVG4akjCdM.body: I just asking a price, not looking anyone who doing it.
Actually i am in big trouble financially. So i do dome hacking around for extra income. So just want to know what others charge for it.

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_155_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): Why not root phones and show the cool stuff you can do with them?

Well its not related to the question, i am here not to show off.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_553_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): Sux if true.  I doubt petty crime be helpful to your situation.

Trust me, this or selling drugs. So i stick with smaller crime. As i just unlocking them.

> [styromaniac@kxoid.bit](#comment_157_1PxcegJ1mKoMHeS73f9MvXeUWDq8BdnSv3): Charge at least $20/rooting.

Yes but 99.9% people have no idea why they want rooted phone to stary with. But when people contact me woth stolen phone i charge them 100 usd for unlock
You guys have to be from USA, thats for sure. But as i sayed in the post heros and god boys walk around if have nothing smart to say.
